author: ap news
title: DOJ charges Hamas leader, militants for Oct. 7 massacre in Israel...
content: The Justice Department has announced criminal charges against Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar and other militants in connection with the Oct. 7 rampage in Israel.

author: ap news
title: In first, Phoenix hits 100 straight days of 100-degree heat...
content: It’s always hot this time of year in central Arizona, but 2024's endless summer has been especially hot in Phoenix.

author: Bloomberg
title: World’s no. 1 air-conditioner maker to expand capacity in India
description: With its rising middle class, India is one of the world’s fastest-growing markets for air conditioners, set to surpass the US to become the second-largest behind China by 2036
content:
Daikin Industries Ltd., the worlds largest manufacturer of air conditioners, is looking to expand in India as it responds to consumer demand for whats become a necessity as temperatures soar.

author: Bloomberg
title: The century old Raymond Group plans two listings by end of 2025
description: Raymond Ltd. to list apparel and real estate units by 2025, aiming to boost shareholder value and streamline operations.
content:
The nearly 100-year-old conglomerate Raymond Ltd. is looking to list its apparel and real estate units by the end of 2025 as the founders look to boost shareholder value.
